\documentclass[12pt]{article}

\usepackage{color}
\usepackage{transparent}

\begin{document}
\colorbox{yellow}{%
  \bfseries
  \color{blue}%
  Blue and %
  \transparent{0.6}%
  transparent blue%
}

\bigskip
Hello World
\texttransparent{0.5}{Hello\newpage World}
Hello World
\end{document}
\endinput

%% End of file `transparent-example.tex'.
